original: Unlike the first film adaptation, in which director Samuel Fuller entirely wrote out the character of Gary, replaced Seberg with a younger fictional actress, and recast the story as a horror film centred on the dog itself, Barbeau-Lavalette remained more faithful to the original book.
simplified: Director Samuel Fuller removed the character of Gary and replaced Seberg with a different actor in the first film adaptation. || He also changed the story to make it a horror movie about the dog. || In contrast, director Barbeau-Lavalette stayed true to the original book.

simplified: The first film adaptation took several liberties with the original book, rewriting the character of Gary, replacing Seberg with a new actress, and refocusing the film as a horror movie based on the canine. || However, director Barbeau-Lavalette stayed truer to the source material.

original: Blogger DJ Akademiks held a three-hour stream in honor of Takeoff, in which he analyzed videos from the moment of the murder of Kirshnik, and also called for fighting the ideology of violence in hip-hop, including stop imitating rappers YNW Melly and Tay-K, who were convicted of murder.
simplified: Blogger DJ Akademiks held a three-hour stream to honor Takeoff. || He dissected videos from the time of Kirshnik's murder and asked everyone to stop glorifying violence in hip-hop, such as that by rappers YNW Melly and Tay-K who were convicted of murder.

simplified: In honor of Takeoff, blogger DJ Akademiks hosted a three-hour stream in which he examined videos related to the murder of Kirshnik and promoted a shift away from the violent ideology found in hip-hop, including stopping the imitation of rappers YNW Melly and Tay-K who were both convicted of murder.

original: The sitcom series features the story of Abi (played by Bolu Essien) who secures a job at a top advertising agency in Lagos, although she had a rough start with her superior, she soon got an opportunity to shine at work when she was promoted to become the acting manager after the manager traveled to another branch.
simplified: The sitcom series features the story of Abi (Played by Bolu Essien) who gets a job at a top advertising agency in Lagos.

original: Two sisters, Leah and Chantrelle, and their acquaintance Hosanna catch a steamboat from Saint Ann Parish in Jamaica to the United Kingdom, arriving in London's Notting Hill before moving to the Midlands.
simplified: Two sisters, Leah and Chantrelle, and their friend Hosanna took a steamboat from Saint Ann Parish in Jamaica to the United Kingdom. || They landed in London's Notting Hill, then relocated to the Midlands.
